name: Auxi Feed
author: Auxilherate

sections.description: Auxi-Feed for Twitter is a WordPress plugin that let you display your twitter feed in a WordPress page using a short code. The display follows the masonry layout and is responsive on all leading browsers. With Auxi feed you can showcase your twitter feed on your website easily .
sections.installation:
1. Download Auxi Feed (twitter version).
  2. Upload the Auxi Feed directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etcâ€¦)
  3. Activate Auxi Feed from your Plugins page.
  4. Go to Settings > Auxi Feed
sections.faq:
How Do I Install auxi_feed?

Download Auxi Feed (twitter version). Upload the \'Auxi Feed\' directory to your \'/wp-content/plugins/\' directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc...) Activate Auxi Feed from your Plugins page. Go to Settings > Auxi Feed

Under what type of license if the plugin offered?

GPLv2 or later Read it at: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/license-list.html#GPLCompatibleLicenses

What info is needed from the twitter API?

Consumer Key (API Key) Consumer Secret (API Secret) Access Token Access Token Secret Twitter name

The information can be found here: Here’s a link to Twitter

How do I add a feed to a WordPress page?

Create a page or a post Add the following shortcode [auxi_feed] Update the page Done!

short_description: The power of responsive masonry to display your Twitter feed on your site.
